plot: The cast and crew talk about how the phrase "...and they have a plan" came into existence in the series, and also provide a behind the scenes look at the movie "The Plan".
title: Battlestar Galactica: ...And They Have a Plan
plot_es: The cast and crew talk about how the phrase "...and they have a plan" came into existence in the series, and also provide a behind the scenes look at the movie "The Plan".
original_name: Battlestar Galactica: ...And They Have a Plan
plot_en: The cast and crew talk about how the phrase "...and they have a plan" came into existence in the series, and also provide a behind the scenes look at the movie "The Plan".
